taDuoc: Colloidal silicon Dioxid (Aerosil - 200), microcrystalline cellulose, lactose (Monohydrate), maize starch, crospovidone (Polyplasdone XL - 10), povidone (K 30), microcrystalline cellulose (RANQ) PH 102, talc, magnesium stearate, hydroxy propyl methyl cellulose 15 CPS (HPMC 15 CPS), titanium dioxid, propylene glycol
